title: Here is your opportunity to live in spacious 1 bedroom!
description:
Here is your opportunity to live in one of the most sought after neighborhoods of Philadelphia. This newly renovated spacious 1 bedroom is located in Old City surrounded by art galleries, shops, cafes, and amazing restaurants. The WireWorks building stands timeless with its red brick exterior. The main entrance has a pristine kept garden terrace and covered walkway. Bright natural light illuminates the spacious living area and calls attention to the ultimate open floor plan that allows for plenty of options depending on your lifestyle. Design one large living area or designate space for a dining area - the opportunities are endless. The newly renovated kitchen overlooks the living space and features everything you need to prepare the perfect meal, including ample cabinet space, quartz countertops, and modern stainless steel amenities. The character of the residence continues into the bedroom, where elevated ceilings, tons of space, and beautiful natural light make this the ultimate retreat. The photos show a corner screen, which once removed opens up the bedroom space. The bathroom is newly renovated, clean and contemporary, and includes a spacious vanity sink and shower. Just outside the bathroom is the washer and dryer. The Condo has large windows allowing sunlight to flood the space highlighting the character of the exposed brick walls. The Wireworks provides secured entry off a private courtyard. Residents have a private driveway, perfect for loading and unloading. There is a parking garage across the street for a monthly fee or permit parking from the city for street parking at very low annual cost (consult PPA for details). Bike storage is available in the courtyard level as well as storage in the ceiling within the condo. Conveniently located just steps from Sassafras Market, Cafe Ole, Race Street Cafe and loads of unique restaurants, boutiques and art galleries. Stroll down to the exciting new attractions along the waterfront which include: Race Street Pier, Cherry Street Pier, Harbor Park, Blue Cross River Rink. Book your tour now as this chance to own in one of Philadelphia's most premier buildings will not be around for long! Tenant pays electric, gas, cable, internet, and phone. $70 per person application fee. One time $400 move in/move out fee. Must schedule move in with HOA during weekday. Move in is Monday-Friday 8:00-noon. Minimum 1 year lease. No smoking. No pets. Application includes credit check, verification of income, verification of employment, criminal and background check, previous housing check.

Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a babka or sticky bun from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. title: Pet Friendly Renovated Town House with Yard, Close to PENN
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023

title: Corner Apartment with tons of natural light, kitty friendly, balcony
description:
Spend your days hanging out with your kitty and loved ones overlooking the victorian splendor of West Philly.
Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment.The only thing you share is a washer and dryer. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm

title: Welcome home to Alder Court (aka 1035 Lombard Street #4)!
description:
Welcome home to Alder Court (aka 1035 Lombard Street #4)! A serene and very private & secured urban oasis surrounded by picturesque landscaping nestled in the heart of coveted Washington Square West. The Parking is optional, and if not needed, the rent would be lowered accordingly. This stunning, light filled 3- story, 3 bedroom/2.5 bath home, with 2 outdoor spaces and a fabulous finished lower level is a must-see! Approaching this very special home, you will first experience the large front patio paved in sleek tile. Then upon entering, open the door to the sun drenched open floor plan featuring the gorgeous kitchen with impressive 42 inch maple cabinetry, stainless appliances & farm house sink, elegant granite counter tops, glass subway tile backsplash, built-in wine rack, a huge breakfast bar with pendant lighting and a picturesque view of the courtyard all open to the living/dining room with floor to ceiling windows and recessed lighting. The second floor offers 2 very spacious bedrooms flooded with natural light, ceiling fans and excellent closet space with decorative closet doors. The renovated hallway bathroom features 2 stylish vessel sink vanities and a tumbled tiled shower. The laundry area completes this floor. Heading to the third floor to the fabulous master bedroom suite with a vaulted ceiling, rolling barn closet doors, recessed lighting, a luxurious master bathroom with 2 modern extra large vanities and an oversized glass tile shower opens to the wonderful private roof top deck! The lower level showcases a spectacular family room with attractive custom built-ins, a powder room and 2 large storage closets. Gleaming hardwood floors throughout every room. There is a large storage shed off the patio. The Parking Spot is located just a half a block away at the corner of Quince & Lombard in a secured lot for separate purchase or rent. First, last & one month's security deposit due at lease signing. $50 application fee per applicant.
1035 Lombard St #4

title: Remarkable 2 bedroom, 2 bath Condo with 1 car parking
description:
This remarkable 2 bedroom, 2 bath Condo with 1 car parking is located at Pier 3 on the Delaware River Waterfront. Situated between Race St. Pier & Penn's Landing, the unit boasts amazing views of the Ben Franklin Bridge with a modern open floor plan and chef's kitchen. Upon entering you are greeted by a private foyer with ample storage space, ascend one flight of stairs to an open breezy hallway where the water awaits. The bright living room features 14 ft high ceilings, ceiling fan, exposed ductwork and a wood burning fireplace. The open kitchen offers plenty of storage, replete with granite countertops, a stainless steel sink with gooseneck faucet, tile backsplash and 42 inch cabinets with undermount lighting. A new dishwasher is being installed. The primary bedroom includes exposed beams, a private newly renovated full bath, 2 closets and balcony that over looks the recently renovated atrium. The second bedroom is spacious and sunny. Full sized laundry is located in the hall guest bath. The pet-friendly building’s amenities include; 24 hour concierge, gated private garage parking, a heated indoor pool, fitness center and a community terrace on the river with extraordinary views. Walking distance to Spruce Street Harbor, Old City & Society Hill’s historic sites, boutiques, nightlife and public transportation. Close to all major highways, bridges and the airport. We welcome your visit today!

title: Welcome to a Penthouse unit in the bustling Old City neighborhood
description:
Welcome to a Penthouse unit in the bustling Old City neighborhood. This bright one bed/one bath rental is perfectly located in the middle of Philadelphia's historic section (5 minute walk to the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall). Walking distance from a huge number of restaurants, bars, and historic landmarks, you could make the most of this pedestrian's paradise. The property comes with private, in-unit laundry and a great view of center city. While you can walk, or take public transportation, to anywhere you would want to go, the building does have parking available (for an additional $150/month). In addition to the skyline view, the modern kitchen comes with a dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave, Refrigerator and an oven/range. The unit is pet friendly for one dog or cat, under 50 lbs. There is a $500 pet deposit, which will be held with the security deposit. Please get in touch to see this wonderfully sunny piece of Philadelphia before it's snatched up.
315 Arch St #702

title: cozy 3/1 pretty cape cod style home.
description: Charming comes to mind when you view this pretty cape cod style home. It is rare to find such a deep lot that backs up to a wooded area with a small stream! The home has newer; carpet-2020, water heater- 2019, boiler-2014 and some newer windows. The driveway entrance has appealing stone & brick retaining walls. Enter into the spacious living room with and oversized window, cozy times this fall in front of the custom brick fireplace with mantle and hearth. The supplemental heat from the fireplace heats the 1st floor, and the heat rises to the 2nd floor bedrooms. The living home has beautiful and exposed beams, radiator heating with a split system unit to heat and air condition the 1st floor. Flow into the dining room with a double window allowing the natural sunlight to flood the room. The kitchen is spacious with a gas range, modern light fixture, custom built-in cabinets, exposed beams and a large countertop for food prepping. Exit the kitchen to the rear entrance mud/playroom with an outside exit to enjoy nature in the rear yard, 556 feet deep. The kitchen also has an exit to the side yard and basement. The basement has a laundry/ utility area, play area, a large wood stove giving additional supplemental heat to the house, there is also a drainage system with sump pump. The property offers a 3-car garage, a 2-car oversized front load garage with a loft and a 1-car garage side load garage.
